record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1926. Fifth row: Dr. C. O. Molander, C. Dickson, A. A. Stagg (coach), and N. H. Norgren; fourth row: K. Krogh, S. S. Borden, J. B. Olwin, D. M. Cochran, B. I. Greenbaum, H. E. Neff, L. E. Apitz, and W. H. Heitmann; third row: R. R. Spence; second row: P. O. Lewis, D. Cameron, J. K Anderson, W. E. Marks (captain), K. A. Rouse, C. B. McKinney, and S. C. Weislow; first row: R. L. Wolff, R. P. Leyers, E. E. Fulton, and J. J. McDonough; (Stanley Rouse and Assistant Coach Crisler are not in the picture).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
